sentences.sContent: Sarah hung her coat on the peg.
sentences.sCn: 萨拉把外套挂在衣钩上。

sentences.sContent: a table fitted together with pegs
sentences.sCn: 一张用钉子钉起来的桌子

sentences.sContent: a pattern made with coloured pegs on a board
sentences.sCn: 木板上彩钉构成的图形

synos.tran: 疾行；孜孜不倦地做某事

phrases.pCn: 小幅度调整汇率；浮动钉住

trans.tranOther: a short piece of wood, metal, or plastic that is attached to a wall or fits into a hole, used especially to hang things on or to fasten things together
